text:
Morsel | NYC and ONSITE

To apply, go here: https://angel.co/morselclub/jobs/121420-senior-full-stack-en...

Come help us build the "Nike of Food". We're working to improve the well-being of the world through better nutrition. We're not just a software company, but a vertically integrated company that makes all of the food ourselves. Software is the secret sauce that lets us do this efficiently.

This is a senior role in the company and you'll be one of the early employees, reporting directly to the CEO.

What We're Looking For

- Javascript, HTML, CSS on the front-end - Your choice of back-end language: RoR, Python, Node, etc. - Experience working with Amazon AWS - Experience working with a database of your choice - Experience working with a startup before and helping lead teams - A desire to get it done right instead of getting it done as fast as possible - Ability to communicate with the rest of the team - An appreciation for design and UX

What You'll Be Building

- External facing products that interact directly with the consumer - Internal systems that help make the kitchen run more efficiently - Artificial intelligence systems that help guide and inform the decisions that the team makes internally
